channel.title: Karl Horning's Blog
channel.description: Notes on web development, accessibility, and learning tech

item.title: Running Canvas LMS Locally with Docker (and Why canvas.docker Didn't Work for Me)
item.description: This guide walks you through setting up Canvas LMS using Docker, explains why 'canvas.docker' might not work out of the box, and shows how to access the Canvas API and GraphQL interface locally.

item.title: Using Blackboard's Swagger File to Create a Postman Collection and Make an API Call
item.description: This beginner-friendly tutorial walks you through importing Blackboard's Learn API into Postman, setting up OAuth2 authentication, and making a test request using client credentials.

item.title: Testing, Testing
item.description: A light-hearted post about testing my new blog, tweaking layouts, and checking how everything fits together.

item.title: Hello, World!
item.description: A quick introduction to the blog: what it's for, what I might write about, and why I'm building it in the first place.
